entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
